cooldown: This command or one of it's subcommands is on cooldown! Try it again in `{time}`s.
slashOnly: This command is only available as a slash command: </{name}:{id}>
guildOnly: This command or one of it's subcommands is only available in guilds!
nonBeta: This command is not a beta command! This bot runs only beta commands.
disabled:
This command has been disabled by the bot dev. Reason:
{reason}
nsfw: You cannot run NSFW Commands in a non NSFW Channel!
paramRequired:
You need to input a value for the option "{option}".
> {description}
strictAutocompleteNoMatch: Your input for the option "{option}" must match one of the autocomplete suggestions. Please select one of the available options when entering the slash command.
invalidChannelType: The channel you inputted for the option "{option}" must be one of the channel type choices. Please select one of the available options when entering the slash command.

permissionDenied.embedDescriptionUser:
You need the following permissions in this channel to run this command:
`{permissions}`
permissionDenied.embedDescriptionBot:
I need the following permissions in this channel to run this command:
`{permissions}`

notAllowed.anyone: No one is allowed to run this command (set by a server administrator)!
notAllowed.user: You are not allowed to run this command (set by a server administrator)!
notAllowed.channel: It is not allowed to run this command in this channel (set by a server administrator)!
notAllowed.role: One of your roles is not allowed to run this command (set by a server administrator)!

emojis.notFound: The emoji could not be found.
emojis.noPerm: I do not have permission to delete emojis!
emojis.success: The emoji has been successfully deleted.

add.selectMenuPlaceholder: Select the guild(s) you want to add the emoji to.
add.success: The emoji has been successfully added to the selected guild(s).

roles.notFound: The role could not be found.
roles.noPerm: I do not have permission to delete that role!
roles.success: The role has been successfully deleted.

members.notFound: The member could not be found.
members.modalTextLabel: Please specify the reason for kicking/banning the member.
